text: Sulabha (or Sulbha) Deshpande (; 1937 â€“ 4 June 2016) was an Indian movie, theatre and television actress and theatre director. She was known for her roles in Bhumika (1977), Arvind Desai Ki Ajeeb Dastaan (1978) and Gaman (1978). Deshpande died on 4 June 2016 from a long-illness in Mumbai at the age of 78 or 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Awishkar website * * Sulabha Deshpande at Bollywood Hungama Category:1937 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Actors from Mumbai
title: Sulabha Deshpande
